sentences: Ma õpin eesti keelt ja samuti lisan ma sellele rohkemat teadmisi.
Lisan sinna ka kõikjal mujal samuti midagi väärtlikku.
Samuti on see väga kasulik näiteks õppimisel.
context: 'samuti' is used to add additional information or items, similar to 'also' in English. It can be translated as 'also' or 'as well', and it often follows what was just mentioned, indicating that there's more to the statement.
